EmailTemplate.name: RE: Reviewing your first payroll with MBO Partners (1339085162.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Reviewing your first payroll with MBO Partners (1339085162.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jeff,Here is a link to my calendar: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> Tomorrow is best for me as well JThanks!Nicolette From: Jeff Vickers [mailto:Jeff.Vickers@omh.ny.gov] Sent: Thursday, June 07, 2012 11:52 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Reviewing your first payroll with MBO Partners Great, if you can send me a link to your schedule again I'll select something that works, preferably tomorrow. -Jeff _______________________________________ Conserve resources. Print only when necessary. >>> <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> 6/7/2012 11:48 AM >>> Dear Jeff, Your first payroll has been processed! I would like to set up a meeting with you so that we can go over a detailed review of your payroll. Please contact me so that we can schedule a convenient time. Thank you,Nicolette TaylorBusiness Manager Direct: 703-793-6281 Toll Free: 800-556-0270MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171http://www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com%20>Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.NOTE NEW eMAIL ADDRESS : Effective March 31, 2012, the New York State Office of Mental Health (OMH) will no longer accept mail addressed to the "omh.state.ny.us" domain. Please update your address book to reflect our new email domain of "omh.ny.gov.
IMPORTANT NOTICE : This message and any attachments are solely for the intended recipient and may contain confidential information which is, or may be, legally privileged or otherwise protected by law from further disclosure. If you are not the intended recipient, any disclosure, copying, use, or distribution of the information included in this e-mail and any attachments is prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify the sender by reply e-mail and immediately and permanently delete this e-mail and any attachments. </htm
